channel.title: 667/7** Making certain Items Tradable

item.title: 667/7** Making certain Items Tradable
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

so im currently working on a code for making lucky items tradable in my zenith source.

the error on the compiler looks like this:

[code=text]src\com\rs\game\player\content\ItemConstants.java:99: error: illegal start of ex
pression
|| ItemConstants.getItemDefaultCharges(item.getI
d()) != -1)
^
src\com\rs\game\player\content\ItemConstants.java:99: error: ‘;’ expected
|| ItemConstants.getItemDefaultCharges(item.getI
d()) != -1)

      ^[/code]

and this is what my code looks like:

public static boolean isTradeable(Item item) { if (item.getDefinitions().isDestroyItem() || item.getDefinitions().isLended() || id == 23423 || id == 42342) || ItemConstants.getItemDefaultCharges(item.getId()) != -1) return false; switch (item.getId()) { default: return true; } } }

Read full topic
